languages.text: {n}При виде вас привратник издает испуганный возглас и сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, достопочтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус! Госпожа губернатор ожидает вас в своем кабинете, под защитой стен и охраны. Как вам будет угодно провести встречу — наедине или в присутствии свиты?"

traits.locale_text: {n}При виде вас привратник издает испуганный возглас и сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваше благородие, достопочтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус! Госпожа губернатор ожидает вас в своем кабинете, под защитой стен и охраны. Как вам будет угодно провести встречу — наедине или в присутствии свиты?"

languages.text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"
languages.original_text: {n}При виде вас привратник издает испуганный возглас и сгибается в глубоком поклоне.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, достопочтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус! Госпожа губернатор ожидает вас в своем кабинете, под защитой стен и охраны. Как вам будет угодно провести встречу — наедине или в присутствии свиты?"

The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

{n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

languages.text: {n}あなたを見るなり、扉にいる兵はおびえた悲鳴を漏らし、腰を二つ折りにして深々とお辞儀をする。{/n}「陛下、 {name}フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下！総督が執務室でお待ちです。壁と兵たちで守られた場所になります。お一人で総督と話されますか、それとも側近の方もご一緒でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを見るなり、扉にいる兵はおびえた悲鳴を漏らし、腰を二つ折りにして深々とお辞儀をする。{/n}「陛下、 {name}フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下！総督が執務室でお待ちです。壁と兵たちで守られた場所になります。お一人で総督と話されますか、それとも側近の方もご一緒でしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}看到你的到来，门口的卫兵吓得大叫一声，连忙低头鞠躬。{/n}“大人，尊敬的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！总督正在她的办公室里等您，那里有高墙和卫兵保护着她。您是想单独见她，还是与您的随行人员一起？”
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}看到你的到来，门口的卫兵吓得大叫一声，连忙低头鞠躬。{/n}“大人，尊敬的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！总督正在她的办公室里等您，那里有高墙和卫兵保护着她。您是想单独见她，还是与您的随行人员一起？”

languages.text: {n}Nada más verte, el guardia de la puerta profiere un alarido asustadizo y hace una reverencia exagerada.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord, el ilustrísimo|lady, la ilustrísima} {name} von Valancius! La gobernadora l{mf|o|a} aguarda en su despacho, protegida por muros y guardias. ¿Prefiere hablar con ella en privado o con su séquito?».
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nada más verte, el guardia de la puerta profiere un alarido asustadizo y hace una reverencia exagerada.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord, el ilustrísimo|lady, la ilustrísima} {name} von Valancius! La gobernadora l{mf|o|a} aguarda en su despacho, protegida por muros y guardias. ¿Prefiere hablar con ella en privado o con su séquito?».

languages.text: {n}Als die Türwache dich sieht, schreit sie kurz verängstigt auf und verbeugt sich dann sehr schnell sehr tief.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft, höchst ehrenwerter|Ladyschaft, höchst ehrenwerte} {name} von Valancius! Die Gouverneurin erwartet Euch in ihrem Büro, wo sie von Mauern und Wächtern geschützt ist. Möchtet Ihr sie lieber alleine oder mit Eurem Gefolge treffen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als die Türwache dich sieht, schreit sie kurz verängstigt auf und verbeugt sich dann sehr schnell sehr tief.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft, höchst ehrenwerter|Ladyschaft, höchst ehrenwerte} {name} von Valancius! Die Gouverneurin erwartet Euch in ihrem Büro, wo sie von Mauern und Wächtern geschützt ist. Möchtet Ihr sie lieber alleine oder mit Eurem Gefolge treffen?"

languages.text: {n}En vous voyant, le garde à la porte laisse échapper un petit cri de peur et s'incline le plus bas possible.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, très honorable {name} von Valancius ! La gouverneure vous attend dans son bureau, où elle est protégée par ses murs et ses gardes. Souhaitez-vous la rencontrer seul à seul, ou avec votre entourage ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}En vous voyant, le garde à la porte laisse échapper un petit cri de peur et s'incline le plus bas possible.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, très honorable {name} von Valancius ! La gouverneure vous attend dans son bureau, où elle est protégée par ses murs et ses gardes. Souhaitez-vous la rencontrer seul à seul, ou avec votre entourage ? »

languages.text: {n}Kapıdaki muhafız seni görür görmez korkuyla viyaklayıp yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri Pek Muhterem {name} von Valancius! Valimiz, duvarlar ve muhafızlarla korunan ofisinde sizi bekliyor. Kendisiyle yalnız mı yoksa maiyetinizle beraber mi görüşmeyi arzu ederdiniz?"
languages.original_text: {n}Upon seeing you, the guard at the door lets out a frightened yelp and doubles over into a low bow.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the Most Honourable {name} von Valancius! The governor is awaiting you in her office, where she is protected by walls and guards. Would you prefer to meet with her alone or with your entourage?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kapıdaki muhafız seni görür görmez korkuyla çığlık atıyor, ardından hızla yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri Pek Muhterem {name} von Valancius! Valimiz, duvarlar ve muhafızlarla korunan ofisinde sizi bekliyor. Kendisiyle yalnız mı konuşmak istersiniz yoksa maiyetiniz de sizinle gelecek mi?"
